name: mise-noti
description: MiseNoti - Sistem Complete de Inspecție și Control pentru Autovehicule

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && ng build --configuration production
scripts.build:backend: xcopy backend\*.php dist\backend\ /E /H /Y && xcopy backend\api\*.php dist\backend\api\ /E /H /Y && xcopy backend\config\*.php dist\backend\config\ /E /H /Y
scripts.build:mcp: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mcp && npm run build:mock
scripts.deploy:prepare: if not exist dist mkdir dist && if not exist dist\backend mkdir dist\backend && if not exist dist\backend\api mkdir dist\backend\api && if not exist dist\backend\config mkdir dist\backend\config
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:prepare && npm run build:all
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run serve:frontend" "npm run serve:backend" "npm run serve:mcp"
